name: Drop All the Time! (working title)
description:
Take (or give?) back the power! Humans have discovered a way to control the weather and use it to their best benefit. But, the evil god Mr. Glacier stands in their way. He refuses to give up control of his weather system or his smaller gods who ultimately decide it. Endlessly bounce through ten worlds as Brennan, the god of rain, to knock Mr. Glacier off his pedestal and let humans decide their weather!

This entirely hand-drawn platformer is great for fans of Doodle Jump, or of any traditional platformer. I originally came up with the idea for this game while drawing a character in Photoshop as I was going along, which I thought looked like a raindrop. This game is developed in the Godot engine, and I created all game assets myself. Keep in mind this game has much more work to be done!
